overview: A couple has been together for many years. Technology screens have entered their lives for good and now there is no communication between them. Is this routine of everyday life the condemnation of their love or not? Something has to be done to bring them together again, to turn off the things that keep them apart. Once the screens are off, simple things like a hug and a book will bring them back together. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: Restarted Love
